item.description:
Get some practice in during the week! Leo J. Martin has a $12.00 twilight rate after 4:00pm - perfect to get in a practice round after work. I've been wanting to try this course for a while now, but heard it can be very busy on weekends.

http://www.mass.gov/dcr/recreate/golf.htm

They have a small driving range there as well. They don't seem to list cart fees, but they are available. Here is what's posted on the website:

http://www.mass.gov/dcr/recreate/greenfees.htm

The date / time is flexible at this point, let's see how the weather looks closer to 8/4. No tee times - they are first come first serve. Plan to meet at 6:30, or maybe earlier?

group.name: The Boston and Beyond Golf Group

item.name: Leo J. Martin Golf Course - Weston, MA - After Work!!
